title: Bug 113047: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children nodes are not being listed out.
EB: The expected result is that when changing the data source, the children nodes of the new data source should be listed out.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the data set editor page in the query tab. 
2. Navigate to the data source section. 
3. Change the data source to a different one. 
4. Observe that the children nodes of the new data source are not listed out.
